dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] www.thsale.com]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Thursday, March 02, 2006 11:27 AM
To: djg@adlexsolicitors.co.uk; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] www.thsale.com]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.



- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html




- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] www.thsale.com
Date: Thu, 2 Mar 2006 14:24:00 -0000
From: Adlex Solicitors <djg@adlexsolicitors.co.uk>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Shanghai Capital&Knowledge Electronic Technology Co. Ltd Shanghai 200065 CN

Dear Sirs

www.thsale.com (?the Website?)

We act for Jagex Limited. Our client has owned and operated RuneScape, the
well-known online multiplayer adventure game, since 2001. There are
currently some 4.1 million active registered players of the game in over 15
countries. Our client?s turnover in its last financial year to March 2005
was in excess of
